name: angelsaddons-petrotrain
title: Angel's Addons - Petrochem Train
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds a Petrochem themed train

name: angelsaddons-oresilos
title: Angel's Addons - Ore Silos
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds ore silos for Angels Refining.

name: angelsaddons-pressuretanks
title: Angel's Addons - Pressure Tanks
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds pressure tanks (extremly large tanks).

name: angelsaddons-smeltingtrain
title: Angel's Addons - Smelting Train
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds a Smelting themed train

name: angelsaddons-warehouses
title: Angel's Addons - Warehouses
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds warehouses to the game.

name: angelsbioprocessing
title: Angel's Bio Processing [ALPHA UPDATE]
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds ways to recycle and process waste products through biological means and make use of biological processes and farming. [ALPHA UPDATE]

name: angelsindustries
title: Angel's Industries
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds components, equipment and a tech overhaul as well as the tool you need to expand and grow your base. [Alpha]

name: angelsinfiniteores
title: Angel's Infinite Ores
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds infinite ores for the base game, Bobmods, Yuoki Industries, Uranium Power, Nucular, Dark Matter Replicators and the base ores for AngelsRefining. Best used with RSO mod to have infinite ores in the core of regular resource patches. Has config options to change the yield for all infinite resources including oil

name: angelspetrochem
title: Angel's Petro Chemical Processing
author: Arch666Angel
description: PetroChems changes and adds Oil and Gas processing to a bobmods game, as well as a more complex web of chemical producation. Includes overrides and tie ins to bobs technologies and recipes. Depedencies: Angels Refining

name: angelsrefining
title: Angel's Refining
author: Arch666Angel
description: Adds ore refining to the game. Compound ores have to be refined before you are able to smelt and cast them into plates. Works best in conjunction with Bobmods and supports additional mods like Yuoki Industries, Uranium Power and Nucular.

name: angelssmelting
title: Angel's Smelting
author: Arch666Angel
description: Angel's Smelting provides alternative ways to produce plate and increase ore yield at the expense of space and energy.

name: AsphaltRoads
title: Asphalt Roads
author: Arcitos
description: Asphalt pavement for increased vehicle speed. Also includes tiles for lane marking (single and double lines) and various hazard areas.

name: Better-TrainHorn
title: Better Train Horn
author: Luc Mellee
description:
This mod is a updated version of Benjamin Lee's TrainHorn mod 

 Original Description: 
 Trains will now blare their horn after killing a player (sound by CrazyWashingtonianTrainNut on freesound)

name: bobassembly
title: Bob's Assembling machines
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds assembling machines 4, 5 and 6. And other machine higher tiers too.

name: bobelectronics
title: Bob's Electronics
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds a whole new electronics production chain.

name: bobenemies
title: Bob's Enemies
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds a few harder enemies.

name: bobgreenhouse
title: Bob's Greenhouse mod
author: Bobingabout
description: It's a greenhouse, it makes wood.

name: bobinserters
title: Bob's Adjustable Inserters
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds hotkeys and a GUI to adjust inserter pickup and drop locations.

name: boblibrary
title: Bob's Functions Library mod
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds a series of useful functions used by Bob's Mods. These can easilly be used by other mods too.

name: boblogistics
title: Bob's Logistics mod
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds logistic related things.

name: bobmining
title: Bob's Mining
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds some useful mining tools and entities.

name: bobmodules
title: Bob's Modules
author: Bobingabout
description: Expansion to the Modules system.

name: bobores
title: Bob's Ores
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds some useful ores.

name: bobplates
title: Bob's Metals, Chemicals and Intermediates
author: Bobingabout
description: Smelt extra ores into plates, and make useful intermediate products.

name: bobpower
title: Bob's Power
author: Bobingabout
description: Adds new power structures.

name: bobtech
title: Bob's Tech
author: Bobingabout
description: Research expansion

name: bobvehicleequipment
title: Bob's Vehicle Equipment
author: Bobingabout
description: A range of equipment for use in vehicles of Bob's Mods.

name: bobrevamp
title: Bob's Revamp mod
author: Bobingabout
description: Technology and Recipe restructuring.

name: bobwarfare
title: Bob's Warfare
author: Bobingabout
description: Make things for warfare.

name: clock
title: Clock
author: Dentatus and Bobingabout
description: Adds a clock

name: Clockwork
title: Clockwork
author: Yehn
description: Changes the parameters of the solar cycle: Make days longer or shorter and control what portion of the cycle is night. Includes an optional Sun Never Rises mode.

name: Command_and_Conquer_Low_Power_Alerts-016
title: C&C Low Power Alerts
author: Jewel724/8ZN
description: Adds in three selectable sounds from Tiberian Sun, Red Alert and the older Command and Conquer titles to play with programmable speakers when your power supply cannot keep up with demands or shuts down. This was originally Jewel724's mod! I'm simply patched it to version 0.16 of Factorio, texts are corrected and de added.

name: diplomacy
title: Diplomacy
author: ZwerOxotnik
description: Adds modified version diplomacy, diplomatic requests, commands needful, auto-diplomacy, customizable protection from theft of electricity and customized settings balance. Compatible with any PvP scenario. UPS friendly.

name: Enhanced_Map_Colors
author: osldgoth
title: Enhanced Map Colors
description: Adds color to items on map/minimap for contrast. Aids map readability.

name: event-listener
title: [item=repair-pack] [color=orange]Event listener[/color]
author: ZwerOxotnik
description: The mod combine events of other scripts. Designed for mod developers. There is an example in the mod. Don't forget about dependencies.

name: EvoGUI
title: EvoGUI - Evolution Factor Indicator and more
author: Octav "narc" Sandulescu
description: Places some indicators on your UI for various little statistics that are nice to have.

name: extinguisher
author: Devilwarriors
title: Fire extinguisher
description: A fire extinguisher

name: FARL
title: Fully Automated Rail Layer
author: Choumiko
description: Fully automated rail-layer

name: Flammable_Oils
title: Flammable Oils
author: Klonan
description: Pipes and storage tanks and stuff will catch fire and explode

name: Flare Stack
title: Flare Stack
author: GotLag
description: Adds structures to dispose of unwanted items and fluids.

name: Flow Control
title: Flow Control
author: GotLag
description: Adds pipes with restricted connections, and several useful valves.

name: helmod
title: Helmod: assistant for planning your base.
author: Helfima
description: Assistant to plan its base. calculates the needs, resources, factories, beacon or electric power.

name: Honk
title: Honk
author: GotLag
description: Trains honk when stopping. And starting. And on command.

name: KS_Power
title: KS Power
author: Klonan
description: Adds a range of different power producing options

name: InlaidLampsTemp
title: Inlaid Lamps
author: Kitsunekaze93
description: This mod adds a lamp that you can embed into the floor!

name: LoaderRedux
title: Loader Redux
author: Optera
description: Adds Loaders. Rewritten add-loader with new loader snapping logic and graphics from Arch666Angel. Incompatible with Loader Snapping.

name: MIRV
title: M.I.R.V
author: Klonan
description: Launch a M.I.R.V into orbit, then call it down for mass destruction

name: LogisticTrainNetwork
title: LTN - Logistic Train Network
author: Optera
description: Adds new train stops forming a highly configurable, fully automated logistic network.

name: more-minimap-autohide-017
title: More Minimap Autohide (0.17)
author: kubiix, ReubenAaron
description: Hides the minimap when hovering over certain entities so that the side-panel doesn't disappear off the edge of the screen.

name: PavementDriveAssist
title: Pavement Drive Assist
author: Arcitos
description: Introduces a driver assistance system that autonomously follows paved roads, while maintaining a preset cruise speed if desired.

name: PSiChatUtil
title: Discord <-> Factorio Chat Utilities
author: Rsslone
description: Enabled chat logging for a discord scraper

name: PSiChatUtil
title: Discord <-> Factorio Chat Utilities
author: Rsslone
description: Enabled chat logging for a discord scraper

name: RealisticPower
title: RealisticPower
author: Kenira
description: Revamps energy production and consumption to be more realistic (harder) and splits accumulators into two types: very high capacity with low power, and low capacity with high power. To be used with DayNightExtender for longer (4h - 24h) day / night cycles.

name: RealisticReactors
title: RealisticReactors
author: IngoKnieto, OwnlyMe
description: This mod adds a more realistic nuclear reactor, a breeder reactor and a cooling tower. The reactors are controllable via an integrated circuit interface, and have a dynamic output depending on their temperature. They need proper cooling, otherwise a nuclear meltdown will occur.

name: Rampant
title: Rampant
author: Veden
description: Improves the enemies tactics by using potential fields/pheromones allowing probing of defenses, retreats, reinforcements, counterattacking, breaching, raids, rallying death cry, and player hunting. Uses nonhoming blockable biter projectiles. Adds new Enemies (disabled by default). Can completely replace the vanilla AI. Difficulty setting in mod options menu.

name: rso-mod
title: Resource Spawner Overhaul
author: Dark, orzelek
contact: Message me on forums or use discussion board on mod portal
description: Overhauls resource spawning system.

name: SigmaOne_Nuclear
title: SigmaOne's Mods: Nuclear
author: Sigma1
description: Makes nuclear fuel, and some other uranium-related item production a bit more complex and immersive.

name: Shuttle_Train_Continued
title: Shuttle Train Continued
author: themadgunman
description: A continuation of the classic Shuttle Train mod by Simwir and Folk.

name: Single-Splitter-new
title: Single Splitter
author: Aidan647
description: Balances load on a single Belt. Fix for 0.17

name: Soundpack-alerts-and-sirens
title: Soundpack: Alerts and Sirens
author: Arcitos
description: Enjoy the shuddering sounds of the harbinger of destruction and doom: This mod adds more alert and siren sounds for programmable speakers. Bonus sound: Railroad crossing bells!

name: Squeak Through
title: Squeak Through
author: Nommy, Lupin, & Supercheese
description: Allows you to walk between what used to be obstacles such as directly adjacent solar panels, pipes, steam engines, mining drills, and chests. No more frustration when walking about your base!

name: textplates
title: Text Plates
author: Earendel, gheift
description: Text shaped metal plates for signs and labels. Letters, numbers and symbols. Iron, copper, large and small variants.

name: TheFatController
author: Choumiko, JamesOFarrell
title: The Fat Controller
description: A conductor of trains.

name: TrainOverhaul
title: Train & Fuel Overhaul
author: Optera
description:
Trains have a balanced upgrade system branching between power and top speed. They also are much heavier, plowing through players and biters without slowing down.
Fuels provide no top speed bonus and less acceleration bonus.

name: TrainSpeedLimit-016
title: Train Speed Limit
author: IceDev, Serialtasted
description: Introduces configurable speed limit signs for trains.

name: UnminableBots
title: Unminable Bots
author: Optera
description: Logistics and Cargo Bots are not minable. Includes mod settings to disable every aspect separately.

name: WagonColors
title: Wagon Colors
author: Optera
description: Forked Color Picker ability to copy colors between locomotive/stop and cargo wagons/fluid wagon.

name: Warehousing
title: Warehousing Mod
author: Anoyomouse & dgw
description: Store all the things! Warehousing provides high capacity storage buildings, including logistic network versions.

name: what-is-it-really-used-for
title: What is it really used for?
author: Mr Doomah, Coppermine
description: A tool to help you find out where items and fluids come from and where they are used.  This is a fork of the original 'What is it used for?' by Mr Doomah, updated for 0.17 and with additional features.  Russian translation by Schmarotzer.  Japanese translation by shiru_tan and shela.

name: YARM
title: YARM - Resource Monitor
author: Octav 'narc' Sandulescu, based on work by drs, jorgenRe, and L0771
description: This mod helps you to keep track of your mining sites.
